Title: Using Conditional Results Directly
Description: Conditionals always result to 0, 1 or NULL. So you can use conditional results directly like this:
SELECT left < right AS is_smallFROM LEFT_RIGHT┌─is_small─┐│     ᴺᵁᴸᴸ ││        1 ││        0 ││        0 ││     ᴺᵁᴸᴸ │└──────────┘
Examples: SELECT left < right AS is_smallFROM LEFT_RIGHT┌─is_small─┐│     ᴺᵁᴸᴸ ││        1 ││        0 ││        0 ││     ᴺᵁᴸᴸ │└──────────┘
